text: Dalma may refer to the following people ;Given name *Dalma Gálfi (born 1998), Hungarian tennis player *Dalma Kovács (born 1985), Romanian pop/jazz singer *Dalma Mádl (born 1932), former First Lady of Hungary *Dalma Rushdi Malhas (born 1992), Saudi Arabian equestrian *Dalma Sebestyén (born 1997), Hungarian swimmer *Dalma Ružičić-Benedek (born 1982), Hungarian-born Serbian sprint canoer ;Surname *Rubi Dalma (1906–1994), Italian actress *Sergio Dalma (born 1964), Spanish singer *Tia Dalma, fictional character from the movie Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
title: Dalma (name)
